metadata.title: How to Add YouTube Tags 2025: Tag Optimization Guide
metadata.description: Optimize YouTube video tags. Best practices, tools, and strategy for discoverability.

hero.headline: How to Optimize YouTube Tags
hero.subheadline: Tags help YouTube understand your content. Not as important as titles—but still useful.

sections.content: YouTube tags help the algorithm understand video content and context. They're less important than titles, descriptions, and thumbnails—but still contribute to discoverability. Here's how to use tags effectively without overthinking them.

content.title: Primary Keywords
content.description: Main topic tags first. Exact match search terms.

content.title: Variations
content.description: Different phrasings of same concept. How people search.

content.title: Broad Category
content.description: General topic tags. Helps YouTube categorize.

content.title: Relevant Only
content.description: Only tags that match content. Irrelevant tags hurt.

content.title: Mix Specific & Broad
content.description: Specific for targeted search. Broad for related suggestions.

content.title: Consistent Series Tags
content.description: Same tags across video series. Links content together.

faq.question: How important are tags?
faq.answer: Minor factor. Title, thumbnail, and description matter more. Tags help with misspellings and variations. Don't obsess over them.

faq.question: How many tags to use?
faq.answer: 5-15 relevant tags is reasonable. Quality over quantity. YouTube limit is 500 characters total.

faq.question: Can I see competitor tags?
faq.answer: Not directly in YouTube. Tools like TubeBuddy, vidIQ show them. Or view page source and search 'keywords'.

faq.question: Do hashtags count as tags?
faq.answer: Different feature. Hashtags show on video page, tags don't. Both can help discovery. Use both.
